title: Square, 1939
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: printed on plain weave
creditline: Gift of Mrs. Henry M. Fechimer
description: Commemorative white handkerchief printed in blue and green showing scenes of San Francisco in 1848 including: a whaler, the first dry goods store, Main Street, the Flying Cloud and other sites. Souvenir of the Golden Gate International World's Fair, 1939.

tombstone.epitaph:
Square, 1939.
1939. Medium: cotton
